summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 716, for the improvement of Howe Street, from First Avenue North to Fourth Avenue North, and certain portions of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by laying a water mains therein under Ordinance No. 9095, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
